you need to replace your gwt-dev jar due to a problem with the 6.2 safari patch: download this [http://www.daniel-kurka.de/gwt-dev-1.7.1-mac-sf-4.0.4-fix.jar patched version] to ~/Downloads

{{{
cd $GWT_HOME
mv gwt-dev-mac.jar gwt-dev-mac.jar.old
mv ~/Downloads/gwt-dev-1.7.1-mac-sf-4.0.4-fix.jar .
}}}
